description: A Flask route file defining a health check endpoint using flask_smorest Blueprint and MethodView.

classes.name: HealthCheck
classes.description: A Flask MethodView class providing a health check endpoint that returns a 'Healthy' message.

methods.name: get(self)
methods.description: Handles GET requests to the health check route, returning a simple JSON message indicating health status.

ctags.name: blp
ctags.pattern: /^blp = Blueprint("Healt Check", "health check", url_prefix="\/", description="Health check route"/

fields.name: blp = Blueprint("Healt Check", "health check", url_prefix="\/", description="Health check route"/
